==German== {{cardinalbox|de|49|50|51|neunundvierzig|einundfünfzig|ord=fünfzigste}} ===Alternative forms=== Colloquial forms are * {{l|de|fuffzig}} in northern and central Germany; * {{l|de|fuchzig}} in southern Germany and Austria. These are frequent in pronunciation, but rare in writing, the more so as numerals above 12 are usually not written out in German texts. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfʏnftsɪç/}} * {{audio|de|De-fünfzig.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # {{cln|de|cardinal numbers}} [[fifty]] ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|fünf}} * {{l|de|fünfzehn}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
